column2: "Sɛ enye obirɛmpɔn kɛtsena edzidzii a
column3: Dwendwen dza osi w’enyim no ho yie;"

column2: "Na sɛ eyɛ otumfur a
column3: Ɔno edze sekan bɛhyɛ wo meneba mu."

column2: "Mma wo kɔn nndɔ n’adɔkɔdɔkɔdze no; Osiandɛ ɔyɛ ndaadaa edziban."
"Mma mmfona woho dɛ ebɛyɛ ɔhonyanyi; Gyaa woara wo nyansaa ekyir dzi."
"Ana edze w’enyiwa besi dza onnyi hɔ do? Na ampaara dɛ ahonya fuw atsaban Dɛ ɔkɔr a otu fa sor."
"Mma nndzi nyia ɔwɔ enyi bɔn no n’edziban
column3: Eso mma wo kɔn nndɔ n’adɔkɔdɔkɔdze no."

column2: "Na mbrɛ ɔdwendwen wɔ no mu no
column3: mbrɛ ɔtse ara nye no: Ɔka kyerɛ wo dɛ
column4: Dzidzi na nom; Naaso ommfi n’akoma mu."

column2: "Trɔma a edzi no
column4: Na ayew wo nsɛm dɛɛdɛw no."

column2: "Mma nnkasa ma ɔkwasea nntse; Na obobu wo nsɛm mu nyansa no enyimtsia."
"Mma nnyi tsetse ɔhe no mmfi hɔ; Na mma nnkɛfa egyanka no kwa mu ndɔbaa."
"Na hɔn pomfo no yɛ otumfo; Obedzi hɔn asɛm etsia wo."
"Fa w’akoma ma nkyerɛkyerɛ
"Mma mmfa asotwe nnkam abofra: Osiandɛ sɛ edze abaa hwe no a
"Ɔwo dze
column4: Na gye ne kra fi samanadze."

column2: "Me ba
"Nyew
column4: Sɛ w’ano ka dza ɔfata a."

column2: "Mma mma w’akoma n’enyiwa mmber ndzebɔnyɛfo: Na ɔwo dze
column3: tsena EWURADZE ho suro mu adzekyee nyina:"

column2: "Na ampaara akatua wɔ hɔ
"Me ba
column4: Na gya w’akoma kɔ kwan no mu."

column2: "Mma mmfa woho mmfora asabokwafo mu; Honam ho edzifodzepɛfo no mu:"
"Na ɔsabokwafo na otumfur dze
column3: wobedzi hia: Na nkomtɔ dze ntangow bofura nyimpa."

column2: "Yɛ aso ma w’egya a ɔwoo wo no
column3: Na sɛ wo na yɛ aberwa mpo a

column2: "Tɔ nokwar
"Ɔtseneneenyi n’egya bedzi ehurusi kɛsenara: Na nyia ɔwo ɔba nyansafo no
"Ma w’egya na wo na hɔn enyi ngye
column3: Na ma ɔbaa a ɔwoo wo no ondzi ehurusi."

column2: "Me ba
column4: Na ma w’enyiwa ngye m’akwan mu."

column2: "Na odwamamfo yɛ mona dɔnkuronn; Na ɔbaa sansanyi yɛ bura heaheabaa."
"Ampaara
column4: Na ɔma nkontompɔtwafo dɔɔ so wɔ adasa mu."

column2: "Woana na ɔwɔ mbusu? Woana na ɔwɔ awerɛhow? Woana na ɔwɔ aperper? Woana na ɔwɔ nkɔmbɔdzi? Woana na ɔwɔ epirakur a onnyi ase? Woana na ɔwɔ enyiwa a ayɛ kɔɔ?"
"Hɔn a wokyinkyim nsa ho no a; Hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ aforafora nsa no a."
"Mma nnhwɛ nsa aber a ɔayɛ kɔɔ no
column3: Na orutwa no ho wɔ kɔɔpow mu no

column2: "Osiandɛ ewiei no ɔsɔw dɛ ɔwɔ
"W’enyiwa bɔhwɛ ananadze
"Nyew
column3: ebɛyɛ dɛ nyia ɔda epo finimfin
column4: Anaadɛ nyia ɔda hɛn mu frankadua etsifi."

column2: "Ebɛka dɛ
column5: naaso manntse: Ebɛn aber na mibenyan? Ama maakɔhwehwɛ so bio."
